lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi's lawyer said the Argentina star and his father were both feeling calm and ready to counter the charges against them as their tax fraud trial opened on Tuesday in a Barcelona court.

headline.print_headline: Messi's Lawyer Says Player and Father 'Calm' About Trial
headline.main: Messi's Lawyer Says Player and Father 'Calm' About Trial

snippet: Lionel Messi's lawyer said the Argentina star and his father were both feeling calm and ready to counter the charges against them as their tax fraud trial opened on Tuesday in a Barcelona court....
